title: Ella and Me
description: Anna has always been the main focus of her family, always showered with attention. This, however, changed with the arrival of Ella. Now, Anna must learn how to be a big sister to Ella and to learn how to accept her sister in to the family.An illustrated picture book about a young girl discovering how to adjust to the newest addition to her family and her new place in it.
author: Kimberley Young
